content:
#  Academic year schedule -- AGH UST 

URL: https://www.agh.edu.pl/en/students/academic-year-schedule
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:19:58

Skip to content ↓

 Academic year schedule 

1 October to 2 March

1 October to 31 January – winter semester classes*
 23 December to 6 January – Christmas break
 1 February to 16 February – winter examination session
 17 February to 23 February – resit examination session
 24 February to 2 March – semester break

3 March to 30 September

3 March to 25 June – summer semester classes**
 17 April to 22 April – spring break
 26 June to 6 July – summer examination session
 7 July to 31 August – summer holidays
 1 September to 14 September – resit examination session

Public holidays:

Additional days off:

4 October 2024 (for full-time studies)

2 May 2025

20 June 2025 (for full-time studies)

*
On 31 October 2024, classes shall be held according to the Friday schedule; on 13 November 2024 and 7 January 2025, classes shall be held according to the Monday schedule.

**
On 29 April 2025 and 23 June 2025, classes shall be held according to the Thursday schedule; on 30 April 2025 and 25 June 2025, classes shall be held according to the Friday schedule.
